VideoOverlay.layer1

機能/意味
Drawing layer specification 1
タイプ
VideoOverlayクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Indicates the layer to be drawn in layer drawing mode. You can also set a value.
　By setting the layer1 and layer2 properties to different layers, the same video can be displayed on two layers at the same time.
